message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This product, which is worth $1,200,000 to you, has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and expectations. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special price of $1,150,000. This represents an exceptional value, considering its true worth and the benefits it can bring to you. I believe this is a fair and advantageous offer that allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
